Package io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.mysql

Class StructuredMySQLConfig<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.StructuredConfig<T>
      • io.github.kale_ko.ejcl.mysql.StructuredMySQLConfig<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the data being stored
    public class StructuredMySQLConfig<T>
extends StructuredConfig<T>
    A MySQL Config for storing data on a MySQL server
